title: Basics of Pharmaceutics: Understanding Solid Dosage Form Manufacturing Processes via Animation-Based Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental pharmaceutical terminology and general understanding of drug delivery systems
context.additional_context: Content structured for smartphone-centric learning environments, employing step-by-step animations for visualizing complex constrained processes

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core processes of solid dosage manufacturing (mixing, compression, coating) with 90% accuracy within 8 weeks.
Learners achieve an average score of 80 or higher in formative assessments conducted at 2-week intervals after animated learning.
By the end of the course, over 85% of learners can reconstruct real manufacturing scenarios using pharmaceutical process simulation tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
